modules

Class Property<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • modules.Property<T>

  • public class Property<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    a class for properties, when value changed all Listeners

    (added with AddListener(PropertyListener))

    will be executed.

    Since:
    21/12/2020
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Or Man

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Set<PropertyListener<T>> listeners 
      private T val 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Property()
      Creates Property with 'null' as initial value
      Property(T val)
      Creates Property with initial value
      Property(T val, PropertyListener<T> listener)
      Creates Property with initial value and sets listener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AddListener(PropertyListener<T> listener)
      add listener to the Property, will be execute when setVal is called
      void clearAllListeners()
      remove all the listeners from the Property
      void emitChange()
      call all the listeners with the current value,
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)

      return the value of this Property

      remove specific listener from the Property

    • Constructor Detail

      • Property

        public Property()
        Creates Property with 'null' as initial value

        and without listeners.

      • Property

        public Property(T val)
        Creates Property with initial value

        and without listeners.

        Parameters:
        val - the value to set

      • Property

        public Property(T val,
                PropertyListener<T> listener)
        Creates Property with initial value and sets listener.

        The listener fires for this initialization

        Parameters:
        val - the value to set
        listener - PropertyListener that execute operation when value change

    • Method Detail

      • getVal

        public T getVal()
        return the value of this Property
        Returns:
        the value in the property or null if not initialized

      • setVal

        public void setVal(T val)
        set the Property value and run all listeners
        Parameters:
        val - Value to set

      • silentSet

        public void silentSet(T val)
        set the Property value without running all listeners
        Parameters:
        val - Value to set

      • AddListener

        public void AddListener(PropertyListener<T> listener)
        add listener to the Property, will be execute when setVal is called
        Parameters:
        listener - PropertyListener that execute operation when value change

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(PropertyListener<T> listener)
        remove specific listener from the Property
        Parameters:
        listener - PropertyListener that execute operation when value change

      • clearAllListeners

        public void clearAllListeners()
        remove all the listeners from the Property

      • emitChange

        public void emitChange()
        call all the listeners with the current value,

        both oldVal and newVal will be the current value

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
